summary: This document is an email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Lesley regarding a meeting request from Jeffrey Epstein to discuss account management with the Deutsche Bank team. It highlights the scheduling of a meeting for the week of October 8, 2013, when Epstein is expected to return to New York City.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Lesley
persons.context: Lesley is the recipient of the email from Amanda Kirby and is being asked to confirm Jeffrey Epstein's availability for a meeting.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is mentioned as having communicated with Amanda Kirby about Jeffrey Epstein's request for a meeting.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the central figure in the email, requesting a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team to manage his accounts.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as part of the Deutsche Bank team that will be managing Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is a client of Amanda Kirby, who is coordinating a meeting for him with the Deutsche Bank team.
Harry is a contact who communicated with Amanda Kirby regarding Jeffrey Epstein's meeting request.
Jeffrey Epstein is requesting a meeting with Paul, who is part of the team managing his accounts.

events.title: Meeting Request
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team to discuss account management.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.
The meeting is scheduled for the week of October 8, 2013, when Epstein returns to NYC.
Harry informed Amanda about Epstein's request for the meeting.
